scripts.postinstall: npm run create-cert && cd api && go mod tidy
scripts.clean:full: rimraf -v -I api/server api/server.exe api/data api/dist/* frontend/dist frontend/node_modules node_modules recipebook.localhost.pem recipebook.localhost-key.pem
scripts.dev:backend: cd api && cross-env LOCAL_DEV_ENV=true ADMIN_USER=admin ADMIN_PASSWORD=password go run .
scripts.build:backend: cd api && go build -o server . && cpy server . --rename=server.exe
scripts.build: cross-env CGO_ENABLED=0 npm run build:frontend && npm run build:dist && npm run build:backend
scripts.preview:go: cd api && cross-env LOCAL_DEV_ENV=true ADMIN_USER=admin ADMIN_PASSWORD=password server.exe
